row.description: Top of the product select screen
Bottom of the product select screen
Top of the department select screen
After product on the department select screen
Bottom of the department select screen
Bottom of 'Product and Department Information' section
Thanks message displayed after ticket submitted
Displayed after a registered user opens a ticket
Displayed after an un-registered user opens a ticket
Displayed after a user posts a reply to a ticket

row.body:
Dear {to_name},

You have created a new support ticket for '{websitetitle}'. {if,admin_id}Your ticket has been assigned to {handler_name}, who will respond as soon as possible.{endif} {if,admin_id,0}Your ticket will be dealt with as soon as possible.{endif}

Ticket Summary:-

Subject: {subject}
Ticket reference number: {reference}
{if,department}Department: {department}
{endif}{if,category}Category: {category}
{endif}{if,product}Product: {product}
{endif}

Message:

{body}

You can view the ticket by going to {ticket_link}

Thanks,
Support Team
row.description: This email is sent to the user when a new ticket is created.
row.subject: [{reference}] {subject}

row.body:
Dear {to_name},

{user_name} ({user_username}) has created a support ticket on '{websitetitle}'. {if,admin_id}This ticket has been assigned to {handler_name}.{endif} {if,admin_id,0}This ticket had not been assigned.{endif}

Ticket Summary:-

Subject: {subject}
Ticket reference number: {reference}
{if,department}Department: {department}
{endif}{if,category}Category: {category}
{endif}{if,product}Product: {product}
{endif}

Message:

{body}

You can view the ticket by going to {admin_link}

Thanks,
Support Team
row.description: This email is sent to the assigned handler when a new ticket is created. If no hander is assigned, then this email doesnt get sent.
row.subject: [{reference}] {subject}

row.body:
Dear {to_name},

{user_name} ({user_username}) has created a support ticket on '{websitetitle}'. It is awaiting approval before being imported into the system.

Ticket Summary:-

Subject: {subject}
Ticket reference number: {reference}
{if,department}Department: {department}
{endif}{if,category}Category: {category}
{endif}{if,product}Product: {product}
{endif}

Message:

{body}

You can view the ticket by going to {email_pending_link}

Thanks,
Support Team
row.description: This email is sent to the assigned handler when a new ticket is created and awaiting approval in the EMails tab.
row.subject: [{reference}] {subject}

row.body:
Dear {to_name},

Your support ticket has been replied to by {sender_name}.

Ticket Summary:-

Subject: {subject}
Ticket reference number: {reference}
{if,department}Department: {department}
{endif}{if,category}Category: {category}
{endif}{if,product}Product: {product}
{endif}

Message:

{body}

You can view the ticket by going to {ticket_link}

Thanks,
Support Team
row.description: This email is sent to the user when a handler replys to a ticket.
row.subject: Re: [{reference}] {subject}

row.body:
Dear {to_name},

Your support ticket has been closed by {sender_name}.

Ticket Summary:-

Subject: {subject}
Ticket reference number: {reference}
{if,department}Department: {department}
{endif}{if,category}Category: {category}
{endif}{if,product}Product: {product}
{endif}

Message:

{body}

You can view the ticket by going to {ticket_link}

Thanks,
Support Team
row.description: This email is sent to the user when a handler closes ticket.
row.subject: Re: [{reference}] {subject}

row.body:
Dear {to_name},

Your support ticket has been automatically closed due to inactivity.

Ticket Summary:-

Subject: {subject}
Ticket reference number: {reference}
{if,department}Department: {department}
{endif}{if,category}Category: {category}
{endif}{if,product}Product: {product}
{endif}

Message:

{body}

You can view the ticket by going to {ticket_link}

Thanks,
Support Team
row.description: This email is sent to the user when a ticket is closed due to inactivity.
row.subject: Re: [{reference}] {subject}

row.body:
Dear {to_name},

This support ticket has been replied to by {user_name} ({user_username}). Please go to the support admin area to view the response.

{if,admin_id}

This ticket is assigned to {handler_name}.

{endif}

Ticket Summary:-

Subject: {subject}
Ticket reference number: {reference}
{if,department}Department: {department}
{endif}{if,category}Category: {category}
{endif}{if,product}Product: {product}
{endif}

Message:

{body}

You can view the ticket by going to {admin_link}

Thanks,
Support Team
row.description: This email is sent to the assigned handler when a user replys to a ticket.
row.subject: Re: [{reference}] {subject}

row.body:
Dear {to_name},

This support ticket has been forwarded to {handler_name} by {sender_name}.

Ticket Summary:-

Subject: {subject}
Ticket reference number: {reference}
{if,department}Department: {department}
{endif}{if,category}Category: {category}
{endif}{if,product}Product: {product}
{endif}

Message:

{body}

You can view the ticket by going to {admin_link}

Thanks,
Support Team
row.description: This email is sent to the new handler when a ticket is forwarded.
row.subject: Fwd: [{reference}] {subject}

row.body:
Dear {to_name},

A private message has been added to the support ticket by {sender_name}.

Ticket Summary:-

Subject: {subject}
Ticket reference number: {reference}
{if,department}Department: {department}
{endif}{if,category}Category: {category}
{endif}{if,product}Product: {product}
{endif}

Message:

{body}

You can view the ticket by going to {admin_link}

Thanks,
Support Team
row.description: This email is sent to ccd handlers when a handler adds a private message
row.subject: Re: [{reference}] {subject}

row.body:
Dear {to_name},

You have requested a list of tickets on {websitetitle}. They are as follows:

{passlist}

You can view these tickets on our website by going to the View Support Tickets section, and entering your email and the ticket password.

Thanks,
Support Team
row.description: This email is sent to an unregistered user who requests a list of tickets.
row.subject: {websitetitle} - Ticket List

row.body:
Dear {to_name},

You have created a new support ticket for '{websitetitle}'. {if,admin_id}Your ticket has been assigned to {handler_name}, who will respond as soon as possible.{endif} {if,admin_id,0}Your ticket will be dealt with as soon as possible.{endif}

Ticket Summary:-

Subject: {subject}
Ticket reference number: {reference}
{if,department}Department: {department}
{endif}{if,category}Category: {category}
{endif}{if,product}Product: {product}
{endif}

Message:

{body}

You can view the ticket by going to {ticket_link}. {haspassword_start}Your ticket access password is {password}.{haspassword_end}

Thanks,
Support Team
row.description: This email is sent to the user when a new ticket is created by an unregistered user.
row.subject: [{reference}] {subject}
{title} has been added.{moderated_start} Moderation is required{moderated_end}

row.description: Message details when showing all messages in an email
row.subject: IGNORED

row.title: Knowledge Base
row.description: Displays a list of detailed articles that can contain attachments, support user comments and user ratings. These can be organised by product and cateogry.

row.title: Frequently Asked Questions
row.description: Displays a list of short frequently asked questions with various visual options available that can be organised by product and/or category

row.title: Testimonials
row.description: View a list of user testimonials specific to each product. Here you can also add a testimonial.

row.title: New Support Ticket
row.description: Open a new support ticket which can be allocated to a specific product or category.

row.title: View Support Tickets
row.description: View a list of your submitted support tickets and replies organised by open tickets, awaiting reply and closed tickets.

row.title: Announcements
row.description: View a list of recent announcements/news items organised by date

row.title: Glossary
row.description: View a glossary of terms used in the Knowledge Base and FAQs

row.title: Administration
row.description: Support ticket administration and comment moderation
